display_name: Kayls with Tails 💜🐾 - Demonatron Now Live!
note:
🐾My friends either call me Kayls or Fox🦊

🎸🎹I’m an electronic #music producer who dabbles in mixing elements of #psychedelia, #cyberpunk, #industrial, #IDM and more under the name of TetraChromacy.

💻📚Outside of that, I’m a university #student studying #computer #science and #elementary #education.

📣📢I’m also a youth rights advocate and supporter of things like #unschooling. KIDS AREN'T PROPERTY!

📝📝Other interests include #gaming, #writing, #reading, #tech, the responsible and ethical use and development of #AI and so much more.

🐾💜I am also a #stoner, #furry and radical inclusionist.

🦯👂#Blind/Visually Impaired #Deafblind
🏳️⚧️#TransRightsAreHumanRights
♾🧠#ActuallyAutistic
🤪🤪#ADHD
#BLM #BlackLivesMatter
#MentalHealth matters.
Can get along with just about anyone.
Doesn’t judge anyone for anything other than behavior. No seriously, I don't judge a single thing.
Refuses to grow up.
Can and will be unfiltered.

🌈🤗 This account is a safe space for all youths. Just please keep it SFW.

❤❤Taken and very happy.

📶📱I have two other accounts that I post from somewhat irregularly:
@LavenderPawprints where my little friend Lizie and I post from.
@NeverBeing for #Dollposting and all the twisted stuff that might bother some here.

👩‍⚕️💊Exploitable commodity that pays the bills of any therapists fortunate enough to work with my dysfunctional ass; I often post about my mental health struggles, including complex #PTSD, dissociative episodes, severe anxiety disorder, and major depressive disorder, which can get heavy at times. Though I try to be respectful of other people’s sensitivities, it’s worth mentioning that sometimes I don’t always CW. If I post something that upsets you, please feel free to tell me but don’t be an ass about it or I’ll just ignore you. I don't suffer trolls.

☣💀Allergy list in case of emergency:
Ageism and adultism
bigotry on things like race, Age, orientation, gender and/or identity, ideology, or exclusionism in general
toxic people
Toxic political correctness
toxicity of any kind
condescension
drama

⚠⚠⚠#NoIndex #NoBridge⚠⚠⚠
👊Fuck Nazis, TERFs, the Fash, and anyone else who thinks they have a right to judge others✊

PFP description:
Kaylie, a girl with long, light brown hair, standing indoors with her eyes closed and a neutral expression. She is wearing a dark blue shirt. The background features a wooden door. The lighting is warm, creating soft shadows on her face.

Header Description:
The image features the word "TETRACHROMACY" in large, bold letters across the center. The background is a futuristic, abstract design with a mix of purple, pink, and green hues, giving it a vibrant and dynamic appearance. The letters have a gradient effect, transitioning from light to dark shades, which adds depth to the text. The overall aesthetic is modern and visually striking.
